goal.ch: 講授機率與統計之各種基本觀念，並介紹其在光學中之應用，以期建立學生對機率與統計相關問題之分析能力。課程內容包括機率定理、機率密度函數、蒙第卡羅計算、統計估算、假設檢驗、以及變異數分析。
goal.en: Introduce the basic concepts of probability and statistics, and their applications in optics.

outline.ch:
(1) Foundations of Probability Theory
(2) Random Variables and Probability Distributions
(3) Fourier Methods in Probability
(4) Transformation of Random Variables
(5) Bernoulli Trials and Monte-Carlo Calculations
(6) Statistical Estimation
(7) Hypothesis Testing
(8) Analysis of Variance, ANOVA
